description:
Shiro discovers the mighty Scales of Karma and yearns to do one more thing that will make him an accomplished dog of hell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gokan Ou no Daiichi Hosakan / Jigoku Onsen
King Gokan`s Chief of Staff / Hell`s Hot Springs
L’adjointe de la reine Gokan / L’onsen infernal
五官王の第一補佐官 / 地獄温泉
